alert.note: Alert for Anson; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 9:07PM EDT until August 22 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Anson County in central North Carolina... Richmond County in central North Carolina... Scotland County in central North Carolina... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 907 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Rockingham, Hamlet, and Wadesboro. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Laurinburg, Rockingham, Wadesboro, Hamlet, Hoffman, Polkton, Ellerbe, Dobbins Heights, Wagram, Lilesville, Morven, East Rockingham, Diggs, Sandhills Game Land, Blewett Falls Lake, Laurel Hill and Camp Mackall. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
